attributes.title: 5 People You Should NOT Meet Empty-Handed (Upanishads)
attributes.description:
February 23, 2015

Today’s (23rd February, 2015) Morning Satsang continues with the Upanishads Series - Living Advaita.

Isha Upanishad–Verse 3 begins:

asuryā nāme te lokā
andhena tamasā’vṛtāḥ |
tāṁs te pretyābhigacchanti
ye ke cātma-hano janāḥ || 3 ||


In this profound delivery of the Isha Upanishad, Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals the essence of the first three verses – say a deep, powerful “yes” to life! All our fears are nothing but the decision to say “no” to life. Making the conscious decision to say “yes” to life awakens all other energies within us that are associated with life.
